heading: Today
text: Any early sun southeast giving way to clouds. Scattered snow showers, more numerous over the higher terrain north, and far southern VT and the Berkshires.  A dusting to 2 inches, greater over the northern mountains. Still blustery.  Highs in the 30s, some upper 20s over the higher terrain north. West winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers diminishing, lingering through the northern and far southern mountains. Lows mainly in the low to mid 20s.  West winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Becoming mostly sunny south.  Periods of clouds, and any snow showers in the northeastern mountains, giving way to increasing periods of afternoon sun. Highs in the 20s to near 30 north, low to mid 30s south.  West to northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.
